document_data.name: Maela Rynduvyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Maela Rynduvyn''' was the mother of the Royal Mage of the Cormyrian court [[Caladnei]], who lived to the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was slender, and had eyes like [[Caladnei]]'s. Her hair was russet, and her skin was dusky in tone. She moved in a deft, and fleet-footed manner, often eschewing shoes.
document_data.Personality: Caladnei remembered her for her passion, and her swift temper.
document_data.Relationships: She married [[Thabrant Swordsilver]], and they had a daughter, Caladnei. She had a sister in [[Westgate]] neither of them had met.
document_data.History:
Maela Rynduvyn married Thabrant Swordsilver. They allowed their daughter, Caladnei, to have her own dealings with the world.

She died while on a ship to Westgate, where she meant to meet with a sister Caladnei had never seen. She was survived by her husband and daughter.
